data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 527,300 citizens of the the county of Ciudad Real.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ciudad Real, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ciudad Real, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 8,443 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Ciudad Real, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, help the fearful in Ciudad Real, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ciudad Real, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Over 22.69 percent of the people of Ciudad Real are far from Jesus.
